article: hey everyone ! it 's been a busy week here at bounty and i wanted to share our top stories with you ! this week we sent out $ 5,000 to our amazing members ! our top member , aka `` squirrel '' made $ 572.60 ‚Üê that 's so awesome and we want you guys to keep killin ' it ! what tasks are up right now : $ 1.00 , and you can interview your friends & family for more $ $ ! we launched an online video survey for people to answer one simple question . you get $ 1.00 for your answer and $ 1.00 for each friend , family member , colleague , basically you can do it for whomever will answer the question on video .

online internet survey $ 4.00 , and you can interview your friends and family for more $ $ ! task available in bc , ab , on , mb , qcwe are reaching near the deadline for our internet survey ! if you have n't claimed this task , hurry before it 's gone ! great cash to be made from an easy gig . üòú convenience store mystery shop $ 5.00 each location . it 's back in select areas ! all you have to do is go to the store and take a photo and ask two questions .

costco receipt photos $ 0.50 each for as many as you find/gather ! this has been an ongoing project for us and there is an opportunity to make as much money as you can . all you have to do in this task is take a photo of a qualifying costco receipt . you can ask your friends and family for theirs or even go to costco and find the receipts around the store . have a great weekend everyone ! kayceemiss having the bounty app ? hit up your app store and type `` bounty do tasks earn money '' .
